Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in #com.flurry.android.ads unless you are creating an interface to third party network mediation using #ICustomAdNetworkHandler.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.flurry.android.ads.FlurryAdTargeting.clearAge()
    com.flurry.android.ads.FlurryAdTargeting.clearGender()
    com.flurry.android.ads.FlurryAdTargeting.clearKeywords()
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.clearLocation()
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.ads.FlurryAdTargeting.clearLocation()
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.clearTargetingKeywords()
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.clearUserCookies()
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.displayAd(Context, String, ViewGroup)
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.enableTestAds(boolean)
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.fetchAd(Context, String, ViewGroup, FlurryAdSize)
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.getAd(Context, String, ViewGroup, FlurryAdSize, long)
    We recommend using the asynchronous ad serving flow with FlurryAds.fetchAd(android.content.Context, java.lang.String, android.view.ViewGroup, com.flurry.android.FlurryAdSize), FlurryAds.displayAd(android.content.Context, java.lang.String, android.view.ViewGroup)
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.initializeAds(Context)
    initializeAds is now handled automatically.
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.isAdAvailable(Context, String, FlurryAdSize, long)
    We recommend using the asynchronous ad serving flow with FlurryAds.fetchAd(android.content.Context, java.lang.String, android.view.ViewGroup, com.flurry.android.FlurryAdSize), FlurryAds.displayAd(android.content.Context, java.lang.String, android.view.ViewGroup)
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.isAdReady(String)
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAgent.onError(String, String, String)
    See FlurryAgent.onError(String, String, Throwable)
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAgent.onEvent(String)
    See FlurryAgent.logEvent(String).
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAgent.onEvent(String, Map)
    See FlurryAgent.logEvent(String, Map)
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAgent.onStartSession(Context, String)
    See FlurryAgent.onStartSession(Context)
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.removeAd(Context, String, ViewGroup)
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.setAdListener(FlurryAdListener)
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.ads.FlurryAdTargeting.setAge(int)
    com.flurry.android.ads.FlurryAdTargeting.setGender(FlurryGender)
    com.flurry.android.ads.FlurryAdTargeting.setKeywords(Map)
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.setLocation(float, float)
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.ads.FlurryAdTargeting.setLocation(float, float)
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAgent.setLocationCriteria(Criteria)
    Flurry SDK now uses PASSIVE_PROVIDER to fetch the location information if app has ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION permission.
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.setTargetingKeywords(Map)
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
    com.flurry.android.FlurryAds.setUserCookies(Map)
    We recommend using the new object-based APIs in the com.flurry.android.ads package.
